MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 386faf59-8f22-2e7c-abc9-d04216e78894 title: Composition animations description: Many composition object and effect properties can be animated using key frame and expression animations allowing properties of a UI element to change over time or based on a calculation.
var linear = _compositor.CreateLinearEasingFunction(); var easeIn = _compositor.CreateCubicBezierEasingFunction(new Vector2(0.5f, 0.0f), new Vector2(1.0f, 1.0f));
